item.title: Reliable Weak-to-Strong Monitoring of LLM Agents
item.description: arXiv:2508.19461v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We stress test monitoring systems for detecting covert misbehavior in autonomous LLM agents (e.g., secretly sharing private information). To this end, we systematize a monitor red teaming (MRT) workflow that incorporates: (1) varying levels of agent a...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> prompt, arxiv, company, release, research | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
